name: MEM (SilentPixel)
description:
A Platformer in the styles of the good ol' GameBoy and many references to games of the same era.... oh and it was made for GBJAM8!!!

MOVE - Arrow Keys or DPAD

JUMP - Z key or A Button

USE MODULE(NEW LEVEL, NEW MODULE)- X Key or B Button

KILL SCREEN TO EXIT(ALT-F4)
